title: JAB Chemo Free, Elijah Cummings, Comedy Roulette, Pimpin' and more.
itunes:title: JAB Chemo Free, Elijah Cummings, Comedy Roulette, Pimpin' and more.
description:
Good morning and welcome to the ride! Today the show starts off with a discussion about class reunions. J. Anthony Brown has a huge update. Gabrielle Union does not tolerate keyboard bangin' and the crew talk about the late great Diahann Carroll. The Steve Harvey Morning Show also honor Congressman Elijah Cummings. Comedy Roulette covers the things people say when they are on speakerphone. Pimpin' is here to share his NFL week 7 picks. Teachers in Chi-Town go on strike over failed contract negotiations with the city. Today in Closing Remarks, The CEO said, "Speak into existence the things you want in existence." Have a great weekend!

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
content:encoded:

Gabrielle Union does not tolerate keyboard bangin' and the crew talk about the late great Diahann Carroll. The Steve Harvey Morning Show also honor Congressman Elijah Cummings. Comedy Roulette covers the things people say when they are on speakerphone. Pimpin' is here to share his NFL week 7 picks. Teachers in Chi-Town go on strike over failed contract negotiations with the city. Today in Closing Remarks, The CEO said, "Speak into existence the things you want in existence."
